importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date when the new regulations on data privacy were officially announced.
The date when the first public feedback sessions on the new data privacy regulations were held.
The date when the final version of the new data privacy regulations was released for public review.
The date when the government announced the implementation of the new regulations, effective from May 1, 2024.
The date when the article was published, highlighting the key developments in the data privacy regulation process.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: This period covers the announcement of the new data privacy regulations, public feedback sessions, and the release of the final draft for review.
This period includes the final public review of the regulations and the announcement of their implementation date.
This short timeframe captures the publication of the article detailing the latest developments in the regulation process.

keyTakeAways: The new data privacy regulations were announced on April 10, 2024, marking a significant step in strengthening data protection laws.
Public feedback sessions were held on April 15, 2024, allowing stakeholders to provide input on the proposed rules.
The final version of the regulations was released for public review on April 20, 2024.
The regulations will be implemented on May 1, 2024, following the government's announcement on April 22, 2024.
The article was published on April 23, 2024, summarizing the key developments in the regulatory process.

namedEntities.name: Data Privacy Regulations
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: A set of new rules introduced to enhance the protection of personal data and ensure compliance from organizations handling sensitive information.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: The central topic of the article, detailing the development and timeline of the new regulations.

namedEntities.name: Government
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: The national authority responsible for introducing and implementing the new data privacy regulations.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: The government is the entity that announced, reviewed, and will enforce the new data privacy rules.

namedEntities.name: Public Feedback Sessions
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: Events organized to allow individuals and organizations to provide input on the proposed data privacy regulations.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: These sessions are critical for ensuring that stakeholder perspectives are considered in shaping the final regulations.

namedEntities.name: May 1, 2024
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: The effective date of implementation for the new data privacy regulations.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: This date marks when organizations must begin complying with the new rules, making it a pivotal milestone in the regulation timeline.

namedEntities.name: April 23, 2024
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: The date the article was published, providing a summary of the regulation process developments.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: This date provides context for when the latest updates were made public to the public and media.

summaryOfNewsArticle: On April 10, 2024, the government announced a set of new data privacy regulations aimed at enhancing the protection of personal data. Public feedback sessions were held on April 15, 2024, giving stakeholders the opportunity to provide input. The final version of the regulations was released for public review on April 20, 2024. On April 22, the government officially announced that the regulations would be implemented on May 1, 2024. This article, published on April 23, 2024, summarizes the key developments in the process, emphasizing transparency, stakeholder engagement, and the timeline leading to implementation.
title: New Data Privacy Regulations Announced: Timeline and Key Developments
